label: Inorganic Chemistry Seminar
description: Required of all Chemistry graduate students whose area is inorganic chemistry. Prerequisite: Enrollment is allowed only by second-year graduate students who are presenting their Ph.D. literature seminar during that semester. Undergraduate students are not eligible to enroll in this course.
courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Enrollment is allowed only by second-year graduate students who are presenting their Ph.D. literature seminar during that semester. Undergraduate students are not eligible to enroll in this course.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Chemistry major(s). Restricted to Graduate - Urbana-Champaign.
